Communication

ConAx make a new creative network to promote Open Innovation on the Data-Driven Science principles

ConAx connects the multi-modal data channels and third-party services to advanced computing facilities through powerful networking and research expertise.

Integrates different levels of communication at all stages of the creation of scientific knowledge and promote research data content through open knowledge frameworks.
